import React from 'react'; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBCheckbox, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBTabs, MDBTabsItem, MDBTabsLink, MDBTabsContent, MDBTabsPane } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import BirthdayPicker from './BirthdayPicker'; import { useState } from "react"; import Alert from "@mui/material/Alert"; export default function RegisterCheck({handleSubmit}) { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [alertMsg, setAlertMsg] = useState(""); const [loginRegisterActive, setLoginRegisterActive] = useState('register'); const displayAlert = () => { if (alertMsg === "") return ""; if (!alertMsg.includes("succesfully")) { return {alertMsg}; } else { return {alertMsg}; } }; return (
setLoginRegisterActive('login')} active={loginRegisterActive === 'login'} > Login setLoginRegisterActive('register')} active={loginRegisterActive === 'register'} > Register
